results.text: እናንተ ታበቅሉታላችሁን? ወይስ እኛ አብቃዮቹ ነን?
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ብነሻ ኖሮ ደረቅ ስብርብር ባደረግነውና የምትደነቁም በኾናችሁ ነበር፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እናንተ ከደመናው አወረዳችሁትን? ወይስ እኛ አውራጆቹ ነን?
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ብንሻ ኖሮ መርጋጋ ባደረግነው ነበር፡፡ አታመሰግኑምን?
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
